oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Risālah : manuscript, [ca. 1918]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ʻĪsá ibn Muḥammad ibn Nūr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, in black, rubricated in red.

With this is bound: Tafsīr "Iqtaraba lil-nās ḥisābuhum wa-hum fī ghaflah muʻriḍūn" / ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm al-Ḥanafī (ff. 27r-49r) -- Risālah fī maʻná al-mafhūm min al-manṭūq (ff. 50v-64v) -- Mirqāt al-ʻulūm wa-al-sirr al-maktūm / Muḥammad ibn Munlā Abī Bakr al-Kurdī Munlāzādah (ff. 65r-84v) -- Suʼāl wārid ʻalá al-Shaykh al-Ahdal wa-al-jawāb ʻanhu / Sulaymān ibn Yaḥyá ibn ʻUmar al-Ahdal (ff. 85r-88v) -- Tanbīh al-muhtadīn ʻalá dasāʼis al-muʻtadīn / Muḥammad [ibn] Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ahdal (ff. 89r-92v) -- Risālah fī masʼalat al-awānī al-khamsah al-mushtabihah fī al-Minhāj / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Ahdal (ff. 93r-94v) -- Risālah fī qāʻidat mudaʻjawah wa-dirham / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Ahdal (ff. 95r-100v) -- Risālah fī al-wikālah al-mashhūrah bi-masʼalat al-jārīyah / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Ahdal (ff. 101r-104r) -- Risālah fī al-muʻallaqāt al-madhkūrāt / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Ahdal (ff. 105r-106v) -- Fatḥ al-Raḥmān bi-al-jawāb ʻalá ahl Qalībān / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar ibn Yaḥyá Bāʻalawī (ff. 107r-116v) -- Kashf al-ghayn ʻammā bi-wādī al-Shardad min dhurrīyat al-sibṭayn / Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr Ashkhar (ff. 117r-124v) -- al-Fawāʻid al-zakīyah wa-al-ajwibah al-jalīyah / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Sulaymān al-Zabīdī (ff. 125r-174v) -- Natāʼij al-fiṭan fī ibrāz faḍāʾil al-Yaman / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Shīrāzī al-Zabīdī (ff. 175r-190r).
Last work in the collection dated on 16 Jumād [sic] al-Thānī 1336 AH [January 29, 1918 AD] (f. 190r).
MS Arab 230. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic law--Interpretation and construction
Islam--Doctrines
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: رسالة : مخطوطة، [ca. 1918]
